message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties to collaborate. We are offering the product for $2,000,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for presenting your product. While I see its value, the price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $1,200,000.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and are willing to negotiate further. We propose a price of $1,600,000 for the product.
Alice, we're getting closer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I could meet you at $1,350,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider a compromise. Our counteroffer is $1,450,000 for the product.
Alice, this is a fair offer and I appreciate you working with me. To finalize the deal, I can offer $1,400,000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. We've carefully considered your proposal and are pleased to offer $1,425,000 for the product.
